com.aurel.track.fieldType.runtime.base

Class DropDownContainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aurel.track.fieldType.runtime.base.DropDownContainer

  • public class DropDownContainer
extends java.lang.Object
    Used by rendering the lists (IFieldTypeRT.processLoadDataSource()), and as lookup maps for select keys IFieldTypeRT.getShowValue(), IFieldTypeRT.getShowISOValue(), IFieldTypeRT.getSortOrderValue()

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<ILabelBean>> dataSourceListsMap
      Map containing the lists data sources Used by rendering the lists - key: fieldID_parameterCode - value: list of ILabelBean
      protected java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,ILabelBean>> dataSourceMapsMap
      Map containing the datasources as maps Used by retrieving beans by key for ex. getting the show value or for sortOrder value - key: fieldID_parameterCode - value: map: key: ID value: the ILabelBean
      protected java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<TreeNode>> dataSourceTreesMap
      Map containing the tree data sources Used by rendering the trees - key: fieldID_parameterCode - value: list of TreeNode
